context.p: You can liven up your breakfast alone in my apartment with a spiked drink.
You can top this breakfast off with a fresh glass of orange juice.

step.cmd: Get one of the nice glasses from the cabinet above the sink.
Fill it to the top with the orange juice that I just bought.
Fill it up halfway with orange juice.
Open the bottle of champagne on the counter, and fill the glass up the rest of the way with that.
